scripts.premfa: npm run build:remote-nuxt && npm run build
scripts.mfa:build: concurrently "yarn --cwd run ./host build"  "yarn --cwd run ./remote build" "yarn --cwd run ./remote-react build" "yarn --cwd run ./remote-nuxt build"
scripts.mfa:serve: concurrently "yarn --cwd run ./host serve"  "yarn --cwd run ./remote serve" "yarn --cwd run ./remote-react serve" "yarn --cwd run ./remote-nuxt serve"
